extensionDescription.message: A lightweight, open-source browser extension lets you preview, search, and save pages to read later.

sendBackByMiddleClickEnable.message: Middle mouse button (scroll wheel) click on a blank area of the page sends page back to the original window.

tryOpenAtMousePosition.message: Try to open at mouse position

disabledUrls.message: Do not respond to the following operations within the page. One rule per line, supports regular expressions, wildcards, and plain text.

sendPageBack.message: Send Page Back to Original Window

enableContainerIdentify.message: Keep open in the same container as original page

modifiedKey.message: Response when selected key is pressing (Please test to ensure it meets expectations.)

rememberPopupSizeAndPosition.message: Remember the last popup window's size and position. Scrolling or clicking the page is required.

closedByEsc.message: Press Esc (overrides page's default Esc behavior)

dragPx.message: At least move px (do not check if 0):

urlCheck.message: Only display the open button if the selected content is a URL

doubleTapKeyToSendPageBack.message: Double tap on specific key to send page back to original window (Please check if it works as expected.)

hoverDisabledUrls.message: Do not respond to the following operations within the page. One rule per line, supports regular expressions, wildcards, and plain text.

dragStartEnable.message: Dragging triggers immediately, without waiting for release. (No direction detection)

previewModeDisabledUrls.message: Do not respond to the following operations within the page. One rule per line, supports regular expressions, wildcards, and plain text.

previewModeEnable.message: Clicking on the link to preview

doubleClickToSwitch.message: Double-click outside images/links to toggle. Status displays on add-on icon on toolbar.

doubleClickAsClick.message: Double-click to single-click: Often used for flipping pages, switching tags, and works better with link indicators. Applies only to links.

rememberPopupSizeAndPositionForDomain.message: Dynamic popups: Remember the last window size and position for each domain. Scrolling or clicking the page is required.

note.message: The priority of size/position: domain-specific > non-domain-specific > centered/near mouse.

percentageSize.message: Window size by percentage of last window

linkHint.message: Link Indicator: displays a hint on hover for supported links.

collectionEnable.message: Read later: Ctrl + Right-click to add a link or the current page (if on a non-link) to the collection list. The list can be viewed using Alt + U (default) or by clicking the extension icon.

holdToPreview.message: Hold the left mouse button to preview

dbclickToPreview.message: Double click on the link to preview

linkDisabledUrls.message: Disable pop-ups for the following URLs, one rule per line, supports regular expressions, wildcards, and plain text.

searchTooltipsEngines.message: Search engines in the search bar, one per line, format: Display Name=>Search link with %s

dropInEmptyOnly.message: Only respose when drop in empty area.

confirm.message: Click 'OK' to keep the popup window size and position, or 'Cancel' to skip them.
